duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide nursing care to patients in the neurology/urology unit, including those with cervical, thoracic, and lumbar fusions, microspinal surgeries, craniotomies, subarachnoid hemorrhages, aneurysm coiling, cerebral/carotid stenting, strokes, and seizures.
Administer care to urology patients undergoing cystos, TURPs, and laparoscopic radical prostatectomies.
Maintain California RN licensure and BLS from the American Heart Association.

education_certification.credential: California RN licensure and BLS from the American Heart Association
